name: GravPod: GigEconomy
description:
Cash is Life

No Cash = Reduced Rating

Rating < 0 = Unemployed Forever

Pilot your pod you collect cash.

Boost, hover, grapnel, and carrom around the residential block collecting money units to stay solvent to stay employed.

Ambidextrous controller layout.

Keyboard layout:

Shift = Boost/Thrust

Ctrl = Brake

Left Mouse = Launch Grapnel

Right Mouse = Disable Stabilizers

Space = Lift Jets

WASD = Aim Pod

Controller layout:

Triggers = Boost/Thrust

Shoulder Buttons = Brake

D-Pad Up/Y = Launch Grapnel

D-Pad Left/Right/X/B = Disable Stabilizers

D-Pad Down/A = Lift Jets

Brake + Lift = Decend

Grapnel (Hold) = Grapnel Beam

Sticks = Aim Pod
